text: Ronald F. Inglehart (September 5, 1934 â€” May 8, 2021) was an American political scientist. He was the professor emeritus at the University of Michigan. He was director of the World Values Survey. Inglehart was co- director of the Laboratory for Comparative Social Research at the National Research University - Higher School of Economics. He was born in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. Inglehart died on May 8, 2021 at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American political scientists Category:Academics from Michigan Category:Writers from Milwaukee
title: Ronald Inglehart
